record.field: 1. Name of Equipment/Item
2. Amount of foreign component(If information available
3. Estimate cost of the subject item (including installation & commisioning) with justification/source: based on Privious rates/Last supplies (Like to Like) in Aiims/Govt/PSU hospital/Cost Analysis
4. Whether budget available: As per Annaul Procurement Plan approved by Budget Allocation committee at the start of the year or reviwed later
5. Competent Authority:As per Delegation of Administrative & Finacial Powers
6. TSEC recommendation: Board base specification certificate
7. Whether required site/space available for installation: ESDâ€™s NOC if applicable
8. Whether required Manpower available for fruitful utilization of equipment
9. Whether administrative approval of the competent authority has been obtain to undertake/initialte proposal of procurement
10. Data of approval of SFC(whenever applicable copy of minutes)
1. Whether list of identified/potential suplliers maintained
2. EMD (if not provisioned need explanation)
3. PBG (if not provisioned need explanation)
4. whether sufficient time has been provided to suppliers as per GFR/PM of AIIMS(specify opening & closing date of tender)
5.whether intimation for Quotation/Tender have been sent to the identified suppliers/service providers

6. whether potential supppliers have been provided with an opportunity to correct unintentianal errors in form(if any) between the opening of submission and any decisions, the same opportunity was provided to all participating potential suppliers
7. Whether pre-bit meeting for addressing concerns of the bidders has been organised (in case of turn-keys contract(s) of special nature for procurement of sophisticated and costly equipment)
8. Amendment to bid documents(if any) has been carried out and communicated to all concerned and uploaded on the web site
9. Numbers of participated of bidders/bidds recieved
10. Whether technical-bid opening at the scheduled date and time has been done in the presence of the trade repersentative.
1.Whether technical evaluation of the bids. i.e comparing the technical specifaication of quoted items vis-a-vis tender enquiry specification has been done by Technical Experts

2. The Evaluation criteria, weightings and methology as set out in the quatation /tender documents have been used to evaluate the quotes (Deviation) if any pointed out specifically with detailed justification)
3. The detailed reasons for not accepting any quote (technical or financial) have been clearly documneted and accepted by committee concerned
4.An evaluation report has been completed and signed by all members of the Evaluation committee
5. Number of technical shortlisted/Approved bidders
6. Comparitive statement on the basis of the financail bids have been completed and signed by all members of the Evaluation committee
7. Wheter comparative statements submitted by user department have been rechecked and signed by store department
8. Whether equipments falls under Propriety items
9. Whether Proprietary Artical certificate issued by OEM is accepted by Deptt. & HoD, enclosed
10. Whether Proprietary reasonability certificate signed by Deptt. & approved by HoD, enclosed
11.Whether the proposal have Buy-back provision(if yes)
12. Whether shelf life completed (if not, please specify reason for untimely disposal of M & E)
13. Total Cost ( including taxes installation expenditure ) and year of procurementinstallation of Buy-back equipement
14. details of stock entry of buy-back equipments/items. i.e Stock register No. And page no.

15. whether buy-back equipments/items cover under warrenty/CAMC/AMC at the time of disposal(if yes, specify detailed justification of condemnation of old equipment within warrenty/CAMC/AMC period) as accepted by the competent authority
16. Whether recommandations of the Condemnation Committee Placed on records(if yes mentioned page no)
17. Reserve price of the buy-back equipments
18. Statulory requirements/approval of authority concerned (if any) completed before condemnation buy-back equipments/items
19. No support certificate from original Euipt Manufacturer (OEM)
1. Whether equipment is closed systemi.e requires regent & consumable of rates/ranking
2.If yes: Whether rates of consumable/regents consider for coparision of rate/ranking
3.Whether RC for consumables (M & S) entered in to simultaneously
1.Whether similar equipments have been procured during last 3 years at the institute (Centres/Main Hospital)
2. Whether Bidder has enclosed SOâ€™s of same/somewhat similar items for claming that he has quoted his best rates
3. If Yes: copies of supply order and price
1. Whether any complaints/representations have been received
2. Whether fully address by user departments and dispose off by technical Evaluation Committee and Stotre Purchase Committe.
3. Whether comments of the user departments to complaints/representations communicated to all concerns

1. Whether justification of rates quoted by lowest evaluated bidder w.r.t last purchase price (LPP) purchase price of othre organisations for similar equipments i.e like to like comparision and estimated price has been placed on record
2. Whether rates are reasonable as copare to last procurment price (if any) or supply orders issued by any other goverment Institution/hospital/reputed private institution/hospital
3. Whether reasonability certificate (if recommended by Store purchase Committe etc.) issued by user department and placed on records(Please mentioned specific page no.)
1. Reference for last tenders(if any)(All references)
2. Reasons of non-finalization of last tender
3. Whether financial bid of last tender were opened
4. Whether current raytes have been compared with earlier quotes rates.(with prior approval of the competent authority in case earlier financial bids were not opened)
1. CAMC charges (in percentage)
2. Detail justification of higher CAMC charges (in case of CAMC charges are above 5 percent of equipment cost)
Proposed period of RC
If more than 2 years detailed justification of longer RC period
1. Exchnage rate of currencies used in financial bids (as on date of opening of financial bids) and source of exchange rate.
1.Rate of Custom Duty (In case of important items)
1. Whether recommendation of Store Purchase Committee required
2. If yes: date of approval of Store Purchase & minutes
3. Whether recommendation of Negotiation Committee required
4. If yes: date of approval of Negotiation Committee & minutes
1. Cost of the equipment/items (before negotiation
2. Final cost after Negotiation
3. Detail of freebies offered by lowest bidder and accepted by User Deaprtment/SPC etc. (if any)
4. Approval of SFC required (whenever applicable)
1.Will check whether attachments, page no.
2.Verify and check against Rules/Rcs/MoU and submit to AO

3. Will approve or comment & submit for approval of competent financial authority, as per delegation of financial power in this regard. Work flow/ submission will be based on Delegations & FIFO. Proposals required to expedite over FIFO shall require permission of Sr.FA. Overall time being proposed for response in FD is 5-7 Working Day i.e max at DA/JAO/AAO level, max 2 days at AO/ & CAO max 1-2 days at FA/SrFA level
